topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555960eb6368726feea11200#post_555960eb6368726feea11200
The Senran Kagura games are weird. The fanservicy stuff is... well it is what it is and that's fine but honestly the writing is kinda way better than it has any right to be.

The characters pop and are all distinct, and once you get past all the stupid boob jokes (and some kinda clever cock jokes) you find a story that is actually pretty absorbing and lot darker than you'd expect from a fanservice game.
